column1: #Text=Zaheer says : " You know , being locked away for so many years , I was beginning to lose hope .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " You 're a very smart young woman , Korra .
#Text=But you must realize that once change begins , it can not be stopped , even by the Avatar .
#Text=" Korra says : " Enough with your philosophical mumbo - jumbo !
#Text=If you do capture me , what are you going to do with me ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " You 'll have that answer soon enough .
#Text=The Red Lotus should have you by now .
#Text=Where 's the rest of the Red Lotus ?
#Text=" Asami says : " What 's the Red Lotus ?
#Text=And Zaheer did n't capture us , the Earth Queen 's forces did .
#Text=They 're taking us back to Ba Sing Se .
